I am going to build on the ongoing thread of "this has nothing to do with the wholesome sauce", first of all, this woman has glasses while Akane has never worn glasses in any work containing her. This next part is convoluted but irrefutable, the child in the family photo looks to be around one year old plus or minus six months, so we can safely say that this story would take place at least a year after "Anniversary" if they had the same characters. In anniversary, Akane's phone appears to be a newer model phone with a small bezel, likely a Motorola given the pattern of vents and the charging port, kept in a sleek rounded case, note the distinct lack of any button at the bottom of the screen. In this comic, the phone appears to be an OLDER model Samsung With a thicker bezel and a button at the bottom of the screen. If there is a one year FORWARD time gap between these two events, why does the phone in the supposedly later event appear older than the one in the first
@pickledginger most condom brands in Japan have similar design, with the thickness printed on the front

@El Sanado 66 Not true, they got married in 294504. The condom brand they use is also the same, so it's possible that there's a connection (look at condom in garbage can on page 7 here, and the condom on page 12 in 294505). I hope it's a coincidence though, it'd suck if the girl was Akane.
Hello guys, I just translated the name in the phone and it just translates to "husband." So this means that there is no direct connection between the famous series we know from this one.

@The Hentai Pope Another reason why this and the aforementioned works are not related (and honestly the most logical reason irl speaking) is that from a marketing point of view it is suicidal to mix ntr and vanilla works, it is the same reason why artists who do both ntr and vanilla do not mix their works for the risk of losing readers who already followed their works regularly, in the case of jorori this argument carries even more Weight due to the great fame that his vanilla works give him.

I will explain why this isn't Akane. A. {Hair} Cuckedhusband has slick hair while Icchan has spiky in all three doujins even when they are presumably in early college. B. {Cup Size} As we can see here in this doujin, the Cheatingwife seems to have a cup size of C or B while Akane has bigger breasts seemingly E or F size (See Ch.1 p.13,p.15. Ch.2 p.20 p.22 p.24) C. {Chin} Cuckedhusband seems to have a more circular chin than Icchan in the picture, although Cheatingwife here has a V shaped chin like Akane, so unless Akane divorced Icchan and married a guy with a more round chin we can rule out that the Cuckedhusband is not Icchan. In conclusion, unless Icchan gelled his hair, went through plastic surgery to make his chin rounder and Akane made her tiddies smaller then I do not think Cheating wife is Akane. (Side note: I spent 50 minutes comparing the characters to make this shit at 5 AM)

Welp, here is my compliment about the artist: he/she is good at using the scene to tell us about what is happening, instead of adding word to explain in detail. Ex: We can know she is a married woman have a boy when we look at her phone at pic 2.
From the first few pics, we can see her wearing her ring. But, when the stranger have sex with her, we can see the ring has been taken off, meaning that she is no longer on the wife, mother role.
And why is she cheating? The ending doesn't explain anythings. Maybe, it's because of the husband care for his wife is not enough, or she just being blackmailed and force to fuck him, then later addict with it. The artist make an OE, make us have to imagine the rest of the story, that even better. Will her unholy relationship with the stranger expose? If that's so, then how will the husband react to it?
Like Einstein once said: "Imagination is more important than knowledge."
Edit: this is just my opinion about the story.
